entry.title: [BHS/SGP/SYD/VIN/HIL][Baremetal] - ARIN
entry.content:
Jan 11, 16:41 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 11/01/2023 15:35 UTC
Start time : 11/01/2023 16:37 UTC
Service status: Services are working as they should be.

Jan 11, 16:36 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/01/2023 15:35 UTC
Service impact : Customization of whois declarations of additional customer IP blocks is unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Our providers are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: VPS - BHS6 - host436326
entry.content:
Jan 11, 13:57 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 11, 12:44 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

Affected hosts

host436326

The list of instances listed below are currently
unavailable, due to hardware fault on the hypervisor(s) previously mentioned. We apologize for
